Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and review the plan for the day.
Finalize root cause analysis and categorization for all remaining data quality issues.
Compile a comprehensive report summarizing the root cause analysis findings and categorization results. Include recommendations for addressing the identified issues.
Share the report with @clinlead-1 (Clinical Lead) and @itpm-1 (IT Project Manager) for review and feedback. Topic: Root Cause Analysis Report and Recommendations.
Incorporate feedback from @clinlead-1 and @itpm-1 into the final report.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the key findings and recommendations from the root cause analysis. This will be used in a meeting next week to discuss action plans.
Organize all documentation related to the root cause analysis and categorization process. Ensure it is easily accessible for future reference.
Review accomplishments for the week and plan for the upcoming week. Send a summary of the week's activities to @itpm-1 (IT Project Manager).
